title: Implement MVP evaluation metrics (swaps, breaks, coverage, BEV gate)
scope: Implement evaluation metrics for identity swaps (severity-1), break rate, coverage, and BEV gate pass rate.
Emit a machine-readable evaluation report JSON.
Make evaluation deterministic and runnable in CI with fixtures.
acceptance: A CLI or script runs evaluation and emits eval_report.json deterministically.
Swap detection is explicit and fails builds when swaps are detected on fixture windows.
Metrics are documented in code and report output.

deliverables.title: Evaluation runner and metrics implementation
acceptance: Runner reads a bundle + evaluation fixture and emits eval_report.json.
Metrics include swap count, break rate, and coverage summaries.

subtasks.title: Implement evaluation report generation and swap detection.
done_when: run_eval.mjs exists and produces eval_report.json deterministically.
